short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly pin and access your favorite ChatGPT conversations right from your browser for enhanced productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Favorites Extension allows you to easily pin and manage your favorite ChatGPT conversations, making them accessible right from your browser. This extension helps you quickly reference important chats without having to search through long histories or multiple tabs.

Key Features:

	•	Pin Favorite Conversations: Quickly save and access your most important ChatGPT conversations.
	•	Streamlined Workflow: Seamlessly switch between your favorite chats and browsing tasks without losing focus.
	•	Intuitive Interface: Easily manage pinned chats through a clean, user-friendly popup.
	•	Enhanced Productivity: Keep key conversations in view, perfect for work, learning, or ongoing projects.

Why Install:

If you frequently use ChatGPT for various tasks and need quick access to ongoing or important conversations, the ChatGPT Favorites Extension is the tool you need. It simplifies chat management, making multitasking more efficient and organized.
